em&#123;font-style:normal;color:#4dd0e1;font-weight:700&#125;.markdown-body table&#123;display:inline-block!important;font-size:12px;width:auto;max-width:100%;overflow:auto;border:1px solid #f6f6f6&#125;.markdown-body thead&#123;background:#f6f6f6;color:#000;text-align:left&#125;.markdown-body tr:nth-child(2n)&#123;background-color:rgba(77,208,225,.05)&#125;.markdown-body td,.markdown-body th&#123;padding:12px 7px;line-height:24px&#125;.markdown-body td&#123;min-width:120px&#125;.markdown-body blockquote&#123;margin:2em 0;padding:24px 32px;border-left:4px solid #26c6da;background:rgba(77,208,225,.15);position:relative&#125;.markdown-body blockquote:after&#123;content:"❞";font-size:30px;position:absolute;right:8px;bottom:0;color:#4dd0e1;opacity:.7&#125;.markdown-body blockquote p&#123;color:#595959;line-height:2&#125;.markdown-body ol,.markdown-body ul&#123;color:#595959;padding-left:28px&#125;.markdown-body ol li,.markdown-body ul li&#123;margin-bottom:0;list-style:inherit&#125;.markdown-body ol li .task-list-item,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item&#123;list-style:none&#125;.markdown-body ol li .task-list-item ol,.markdown-body ol li .task-list-item ul,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item ol,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item ul&#123;margin-top:0&#125;.markdown-body ol ol,.markdown-body ol ul,.markdown-body ul ol,.markdown-body ul ul&#123;margin-top:3px&#125;.markdown-body ol li&#123;padding-left:6px&#125;@media (max-width:720px)&#123;.markdown-body h1&#123;font-size:24px&#125;.markdown-body h2&#123;font-size:20px&#125;.markdown-body h3&#123;font-size:18px&#125;&#125;</style><h2 data-id="heading-0">前言</h2>
<p>最近想写一个可以适配多平台的请求库，在研究 xhr 和 fetch 发现二者的参数、响应、回调函数等差别很大。想到如果请求库想要适配多平台，需要统一的传参和响应格式，那么势必会在请求库内部做大量的判断，这样不但费时费力，还会屏蔽掉底层请求内核差异。</p>
<p>阅读 axios 和 umi-request 源码时想到，请求库其实基本都包含了拦截器、中间件和快捷请求等几个通用的，与具体请求过程无关的功能。然后通过传参，让用户接触底层请求内核。问题在于，请求库内置多个底层请求内核，内核支持的参数是不一样的，上层库可能做一些处理，抹平一些参数的差异化，但对于底层内核的特有的功能，要么放弃，要么只能在参数列表中加入一些具体内核的特有的参数。比如在 axios 中，它的请求配置参数列表中，罗列了一些 <a href="https://axios-http.com/docs/req_config" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">browser only</a>的参数，那对于只需要在 node 环境中运行的 axios 来说，参数多少有些冗余，并且如果 axios 要支持其他请求内核(比如小程序、快应用、华为鸿蒙等)，那么参数冗余也将越来越大，扩展性也差。</p>
<p>换个思路来想，既然实现一个适配多平台的统一的请求库有这些问题，那么是否可以从底向上的，针对不同的请求内核，提供一种方式可以很方便的为其赋予拦截器、中间件、快捷请求等几个通用功能，并且保留不同请求内核的差异化？</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">设计实现</h2>
<p>我们的请求库要想与请求内核无关，那么只能采用内核与请求库相分离的模式。使用时，需要将请求内核传入，初始化一个实例，再进行使用。或者基于请求库，传入内核，预置请求参数来进行二次封装。</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-2">基本架构</h3>
<p>首先实现一个基本的架构</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ts copyable" lang="ts"><span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">PreQuest</span> </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-title">constructor</span>(<span class="hljs-params"><span class="hljs-keyword">private</span> adapter</span>)
    
    <span class="hljs-title">request</span>(<span class="hljs-params">opt</span>) &#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.adapter(opt)
    &#125;
&#125;

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> adapter = <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">opt</span>) =></span> nativeRequestApi(opt)
<span class="hljs-comment">// eg: const adapter = (opt) => fetch(opt).then(res => res.json())</span>

<span class="hljs-comment">// 创建实例</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> prequest = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> PreQuest(adapter)

<span class="hljs-comment">// 这里实际调用的是 adapter 函数</span>
prequest.request(&#123; <span class="hljs-attr">url</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'http://localhost:3000/api'</span> &#125;)
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>可以看到，这里饶了个弯，通过实例方法调用了 adapter 函数。</p>
<p>这样的话，为修改请求和响应提供了想象空间。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ts copyable" lang="ts"><span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">PreQuest</span> </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// ...some code</span>
    
    <span class="hljs-keyword">async</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">request</span>(<span class="hljs-params">opt</span>)</span>&#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> options = modifyReqOpt(opt)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> res = <span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.adapter(options)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> modifyRes(res)
    &#125;

    <span class="hljs-comment">// ...some code</span>
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-3">中间件</h3>
<p>可以采用 koa 的洋葱模型，对请求进行拦截和修改。</p>
<p>中间件调用示例:</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ts copyable" lang="ts"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> prequest = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> PreQuest(adapter)

prequest.use(<span class="hljs-keyword">async</span> (ctx, next) => &#123;
    ctx.request.path = <span class="hljs-string">'/perfix'</span> + ctx.request.path
    <span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> next()
    ctx.response.body = <span class="hljs-built_in">JSON</span>.parse(ctx.response.body)
&#125;)
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>实现中间件基本模型？</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ts copyable" lang="ts"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> compose =  <span class="hljs-built_in">require</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'koa-compose'</span>)

<span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">Middleware</span> </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 中间件列表</span>
    cbs = []
    
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 注册中间件</span>
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">use</span>(<span class="hljs-params">cb</span>)</span> &#123;
       <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.cbs.push(cb)
       <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>
    &#125;
    
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 执行中间件</span>
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">exec</span>(<span class="hljs-params">ctx, next</span>)</span>&#123;
        <span class="hljs-comment">// 中间件执行细节不是重点，所以直接使用 koa-compose 库</span>
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> compose(<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.cbs)(ctx, next)
    &#125;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>全局中间件，只需要添加一个 use 和 exec 的静态方法即可。</p>
<p>PreQuest 继承自 Middleware 类，即可在实例上注册中间件。</p>
<p>那么怎么在请求前调用中间件?</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ts copyable" lang="ts"><span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">PreQuest</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">extends</span> <span class="hljs-title">Middleware</span> </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// ...some code</span>
     
    <span class="hljs-keyword">async</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">request</span>(<span class="hljs-params">opt</span>)</span> &#123;
    
        <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> ctx = &#123;
            <span class="hljs-attr">request</span>: opt,
            <span class="hljs-attr">response</span>: &#123;&#125;
        &#125;
        
        <span class="hljs-comment">// 执行中间件</span>
        <span class="hljs-keyword">async</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.exec(ctx, <span class="hljs-keyword">async</span> (ctx) => &#123;
            ctx.response = <span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.adapter(ctx.request)
        &#125;)
        
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> ctx.response
    &#125;
        
    <span class="hljs-comment">// ...some code</span>
&#125;

<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>中间件模型中，前一个中间件的返回值是传不到下一个中间件中，所以是通过一个对象在中间件中传递和赋值。</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-4">拦截器</h3>
<p>拦截器是修改参数和响应的另一种方式。</p>
<p>首先看一下 axios 中拦截器是怎么用的。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ts copyable" lang="ts"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> axios <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'axios'</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> instance = axios.create()

instance.interceptor.request.use(
    <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">opt</span>) =></span> modifyOpt(opt),
    <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">e</span>) =></span> handleError(e)
)
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>根据用法，我们可以实现一个基本结构</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ts copyable" lang="ts"><span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">Interceptor</span> </span>&#123;
    cbs = []
    
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 注册拦截器</span>
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">use</span>(<span class="hljs-params">successHandler, errorHandler</span>)</span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.cbs.push(&#123; successHandler, errorHandler &#125;)
    &#125;
    
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">exec</span>(<span class="hljs-params">opt</span>)</span> &#123;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.cbs.reduce(
        <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">t, c, idx</span>) =></span> t.then(c.successHandler, <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.handles[idx - <span class="hljs-number">1</span>]?.errorHandler),
        <span class="hljs-built_in">Promise</span>.resolve(opt)
      )
      .catch(<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.handles[<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.handles.length - <span class="hljs-number">1</span>].errorHandler)
    &#125;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>代码很简单，有点难度的就是拦截器的执行了。这里主要有两个知识点: Array.reduce 和 Promise.then 第二个参数的使用。</p>
<p>注册拦截器时，<code>successHandler</code> 与 <code>errorHandler</code> 是成对的， successHandler 中抛出的错误，要在对应的 errorHandler 中处理，所以 errorHandler 接收到的错误，是上一个拦截器中抛出的。</p>
<p>拦截器怎么使用呢?</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ts copyable" lang="ts"><span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">PreQuest</span> </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// ... some code</span>
    interceptor = &#123;
        <span class="hljs-attr">request</span>: <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> Interceptor()
        <span class="hljs-attr">response</span>: <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> Interceptor()
    &#125;
    
    <span class="hljs-comment">// ...some code</span>
    
    <span class="hljs-keyword">async</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">request</span>(<span class="hljs-params">opt</span>)</span>&#123;
        
        <span class="hljs-comment">// 执行拦截器，修改请求参数</span>
        <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> options = <span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.interceptor.request.exec(opt)
        
        <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> res = <span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.adapter(options)
        
        <span class="hljs-comment">// 执行拦截器，修改响应数据</span>
        <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> response = <span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.interceptor.response.exec(res)
        
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> response
    &#125;
    
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-5">拦截器中间件</h3>
<p>拦截器也可以是一个中间件，可以通过注册中间件来实现。请求拦截器在 <code>await next()</code> 前执行，响应拦截器在其后。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ts copyable" lang="ts"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> instance = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> Middleware()

instance.use(<span class="hljs-keyword">async</span> (ctx, next) => &#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// Promise 链式调用，更改请求参数</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Promise</span>.resolve().then(reqInterceptor1).then(reqInterceptor2)...
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 执行下一个中间件、或执行到 this.adapter 函数</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> next()
    <span class="hljs-comment">// Promise 链式调用，更改响应数据</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Promise</span>.resolve().then(resInterceptor1).then(resInterceptor2)...
&#125;)
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>拦截器有请求拦截器和响应拦截器两类。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ts copyable" lang="ts"><span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">InterceptorMiddleware</span> </span>&#123;
    request = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> Interceptor()
    response = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> Interceptor()
    
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 注册中间件</span>
    <span class="hljs-attr">register</span>: <span class="hljs-keyword">async</span> (ctx, next) &#123;
        ctx.request = <span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.request.exec(ctx.request)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> next()
        ctx.response = <span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> thie.response.exec(ctx.response)
    &#125;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>使用</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ts copyable" lang="ts"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> instance = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> Middleware()
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> interceptor = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> InterceptorMiddleware()

<span class="hljs-comment">// 注册拦截器</span>
interceptor.request.use(
    <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">opt</span>) =></span> modifyOpt(opt),
    <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">e</span>) =></span> handleError(e)
)

<span class="hljs-comment">// 注册到中间中</span>
instance.use(interceptor.register)
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-6">实战</h2>
<p>以微信小程序为例。小程序中自带的 <code>wx.request</code> 并不好用。使用上面我们封装的代码，可以很容易的打造出一个小程序请求库。</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-7">封装小程序原生请求</h3>
<p>将原生小程序请求 Promise 化，设计传参 opt 对象</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ts copyable" lang="ts"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">adapter</span>(<span class="hljs-params">opt</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> &#123; path, method, baseURL, ...options &#125; = opt
  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> url = baseURL + path
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Promise</span>(<span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">resolve, reject</span>) =></span> &#123;
    wx.request(&#123;
      ...options,
      url,
      method,
      <span class="hljs-attr">success</span>: resolve,
      <span class="hljs-attr">fail</span>: reject,
    &#125;)
  &#125;)
&#125;

<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-8">调用</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ts copyable" lang="ts"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> instance = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> PreQuest(adapter)

<span class="hljs-comment">// 中间件模式</span>
instance.use(<span class="hljs-keyword">async</span> (ctx, next) => &#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 修改请求参数</span>
    ctx.request.path = <span class="hljs-string">'/prefix'</span> + ctx.request.path
    
    <span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> next()
    
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 修改响应</span>
    ctx.response.body = <span class="hljs-built_in">JSON</span>.parse(ctx.response.body)
&#125;)

<span class="hljs-comment">// 拦截器模式</span>
instance.interecptor.request.use(
    <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">opt</span>) =></span> &#123;
        opt.path = <span class="hljs-string">'/prefix'</span> + opt.path
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> opt
    &#125;
)

instance.request(&#123; <span class="hljs-attr">path</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'/api'</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">baseURL</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'http://localhost:3000'</span> &#125;)
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-9">其它</h3>
<p>获取 <code>wx.request</code> 请求实例、兼容多个小程序平台等请参阅 <a href="https://github.com/xdoer/PreQuest/tree/main/packages/miniprogram" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">@prequest/miniprogram</a></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-10">结语</h2>
<p>上面的内容中，我们基本实现了一个与请求内核无关的请求库，并且设计了两种拦截请求和响应的方式，我们可以根据自己的需求和喜好自由选择。</p>
<p>这种内核装卸的方式非常容易扩展。当面对一个 axios 不支持的平台时，也不用费劲的去找开源好用的请求库了。我相信很多人在开发小程序的时候，基本都有去找 axios-miniprogram 的解决方案。通过我们的 PreQuest 项目，可以体验到类似 axios 的能力。</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/xdoer/PreQuest" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">PreQuest</a> 项目中，除了上面提到的内容，还提供了全局配置、全局中间件、别名请求等功能。项目中也有基于 <code>PreQuest</code> 封装的请求库，<a href="https://github.com/xdoer/PreQuest/tree/main/packages/miniprogram" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">@prequest/miniprogram</a>,<a href="https://github.com/xdoer/PreQuest/tree/main/packages/fetch" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">@prequest/fetch</a>...也针对一些使用原生 xhr、fetch 等 API 的项目，提供了一种不侵入的方式来赋予 PreQuest的能力 <a href="https://github.com/xdoer/PreQuest/tree/main/packages/wrapper" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">@prequest/wrapper</a></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-11">参考</h2>
